shloka: न रूपमस्येह तथोपलभ्यते    नान्तो न चादिर्न च संप्रतिष्ठा।अश्वत्थमेनं सुविरूढमूल    मसङ्गशस्त्रेण दृढेन छित्त्वा।।15.3।।
translation: 15.3 Its form is not perceived here as such, neither its end nor its origin, nor its foundation nor resting place: having cut asunder this firmly rooted peepul tree with the strong axe of non-attachment.
